rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0010
rows.name: Hey, how's it poppin'?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0020
rows.name: Terrible, how about you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0030
rows.name: Better than you, in other words terrific.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0040
rows.name: ...You hear that? Rook's answer?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0050
rows.name: Yes. And you seemed pleased.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0070
rows.name: Yeah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0080
rows.name: Although, why did you want someone else to make the call?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0090
rows.name:
If I get taken out, I want to know there's someone
I can trust with mankind's future.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0100
rows.name: And the Rook seems well-suited.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0110
rows.name: That isn't like you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0120
rows.name:
That's what we need right now—
someone who loves this world.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0130
rows.name: The world and its people, warts and all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0140
rows.name: I need someone to take over my duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0150
rows.name: You need another you, in other words.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0160
rows.name: When we were leaving Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0170
rows.name:
you ignored my pleas, and rushed off to fight
without a thought for your safety.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0180
rows.name: Al...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0190
rows.name: You look after the refugees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0200
rows.name: I'll protect the ship from outside.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0210
rows.name: Just look at their numbers...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0220
rows.name: You can't shift the balance—not with a single Ares![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0230
rows.name: Yeah, well, you never know until you try![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0240
rows.name: Al...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0250
rows.name: I'll cut through their ranks, make you an opening.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0260
rows.name: I'll protect you, to the last...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0270
rows.name: The people of Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0280
rows.name: will not be snuffed out here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0290
rows.name: You're right...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs32170100_MSG0300
rows.name: Those eyes... They're just like yours back then.[ST:wait ]
